Sentencas: To achieve sustainable development of the global energy system, it is essential to develop efficient and cost-effective cogeneration systems.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: This paper introduces a new cogeneration system named SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG, which combines solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), internal combustion engines (ICE), supercritical carbon dioxide (SCO2) power cycles, and heat recovery steam generators (HRSG) to generate electricity and heating simultaneously.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: The proposed system offers a promising solution for achieving high efficiency and cost-effective clean power generation and heating.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: Energy, exergic, exergoceconomic, and environmental analyses were conducted to evaluate the system's performance.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: The impact of fuel flow, steam carbon ratio, and other parameters on the system's efficiency was also analyzed.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: The system was optimized using a genetic algorithm, and the optimal operating condition was determined using the TOPSIS method.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: The results indicate that the proposed system can achieve a total output power and net output power of 345.58 kW and 288.94 kW, respectively, under optimal conditions, with a 1:1 fuel flow ratio between the SOFC and ICE systems.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: The total unit cost of the product can be as low as 42.98 $/GJ, while the theoretical and actual generation efficiencies can reach 48.00% and 40.13%, respectively.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: The overall energy efficiency and exergy efficiency were found to be 65.82% and 42.28%, respectively.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: Additionally, the system can achieve a CO2 emission rate of 0.4712 kg/kW.h, and the social cost for pollutant emissions was estimated to be 3.34 $/GJ.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: This study provides evidence that the proposed hybrid system has excellent performance in terms of efficiency, cost, and environmental impact.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation

Sentencas: As an advanced energy conversion technology, it holds great potential for practical applications in meeting energy demands while reducing environmental pollution.
Titulo: Energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, environmental (4E) evaluation and multi-objective optimization of a novel SOFC-ICE-SCO2-HRSG hybrid system for power and heat generation
